Uses of Package
org.sontana

  • Packages that use org.sontana 
    Package Description
    org.sontana  
    org.sontana.components  
    org.sontana.engine  
  • Classes in org.sontana used by org.sontana 
    Class Description
    Actor
    Actor objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered and react to input.
    Behaviour
    The Behaviour class is what objects in an AbstractScene derive from.
    GameSystem
    GameSystem objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are not rendered.
    Pawn
    Pawn objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered.
  • Classes in org.sontana used by org.sontana.components 
    Class Description
    Pawn
    Pawn objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered.
  • Classes in org.sontana used by org.sontana.engine 
    Class Description
    AbstractScene
    AbstractScene objects represents different game stages.
    Actor
    Actor objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered and react to input.
